verbs.description: [ARG1: A Trump administration public - housing initiative] [V: unveiled] [ARG0: by HUD Secretary Ben Carson] would encourage work requirements , lower housing subsidies , and triple the minimum rent for the very poor . Lucky it ’s just a 2018 preelection ploy .
